Examples
========

The examples listed here are fully worked out example networks and protocols.
You will learn the most by studying the code in the module files directly.

You can use this Python script to locate the directory of example modules on your system:

.. code-block:: python

    import os
    import netsquid as ns
    print("Examples directory: {}".format(os.path.dirname(ns.examples.__file__)))

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 2

    learn_examples/learn.examples.teleportation
    learn_examples/learn.examples.repeater
    learn_examples/learn.examples.repeater_chain
    learn_examples/learn.examples.simple_link
    learn_examples/learn.examples.magic_simple_link
